jd: From: Abhishek Pathak, Stellar Consulting Solutions abhishek.pathak@stellarconsulting.com Reply to: abhishek.pathak@stellarconsulting.com Note: Local to AZ or NC.Note: Available for F2F Interview.Job Title: Sr. Java DeveloperDuration: 6 months Contract (Possible extensions)Location: Phoenix, AZ/Charlotte, NC (Hybrid 3 days/week in office)Exp.: 10 yearsJob Description/Responsibilities• Candidate should be ready to work from client office for atleast 3 days a week.• Proficiency in Java 17 with experience in Writing REST API, backend logic (batch jobs / Kafka processors) using spring boot• Exposure to Non-Relational DB like MongoDB.• Hands on experience on kafka is must• Proficient in using and adopting CICD Devops tools like GitHub, Jenkins, Urban Code Deploy/Harness etc.• Candidate should be able to work as individual contributor• Candidate should have exposure in microservice applications• Associate should have good analytical skills, should be able to debug the application and understand the concepts.
